description: This file defines classes for managing Docker containers and container mounts, including creation, deletion, reading, and updating containers using Docker API clients. It includes detailed methods for container lifecycle management and configuration.

classes.name: DockerContainerMount
classes.description: Represents a volume mount configuration for a Docker container, including target, source, type, read-only flag, and labels.

classes.name: DockerContainer
classes.description: Represents a Docker container with properties for configuration and methods for lifecycle management such as create, delete, read, update, and check if active.

methods.name: run_container
methods.description: Starts a Docker container using the provided DockerApiClient, with optional image pulling and progress display.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates a Docker container, deleting existing one if necessary, and validates its creation and running state.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads and returns the Docker container object if it exists and is active.

methods.name: _update
methods.description: Updates the container by recreating it.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the container, stopping and removing it as needed, and validating deletion.

methods.name: is_active
methods.description: Checks if the container is currently running on the Docker cluster.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Public method to create the container, using cache if specified, and reporting status.
